sys_openapi_operation.name: Archives an asset. - (POST) /assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}/{assetId}/archive
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Archives an asset.","fOperationId":"archiveAssetByAssetID","fDescription":"Archives an asset. The specified reason for archiving will be filled in. If the specified asset is already archived, nothing will happen (the reason for archiving will not be updated either).

| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With permission to (un)archive assets | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}/{assetId}/archive","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson0885763733","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/ReasonForArchiving","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"204","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • No reason for archiving is given.
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson6659581179","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/BadRequestEntity","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The specified asset template does not exist.
  • The specified asset template is archived.
  • The specified asset does not exist.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"The template id specifying the type of the asset.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateId0215628771","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"assetId","fDescription":"The id of the asset to be archived.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"assetId7551899907","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
